version_description:
A FWRD Update!
A few app crashes have been reported, so we went ahead and got rid of the bugs for you. We also have sped up the app's startup, so now you can get to shopping even faster!

We've made some updates! Download the latest version of our app for new features & improvements.
• General bug fixes & performance improvements
• New! Ability to tap on the designer name from the product page to shop the whole collection
• Fixed some issues that weren't letting international customers check out

We've made some updates! Download the latest version of our app to:
• Get notifications when your favorite styles are back in stock!
• Place a special order in your correct size directly through the app
We've made some updates! Download the latest version of our app for new features & improvements.

• You can now tap on individual items in your bag for review
• Fine jewelry messaging

We've made quite a few updates! Download the latest version of our app to browse our new features.

• New easy-to-use navigation, including easy access to the search, shopping bag, and wish list
• Bottom global navigation update for easier access to all shopping pages and editorial look books
• New: You can now see your recently viewed items
• DDP shipping options for international customers
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

Thanks,
FWRD
Fixed layout issues and crash bugs.

We've made quite a few updates! Download the latest version of our app to browse our new features.

Thanks,
FWRD

*FWRD iPhone App V3.1.0*
• Wedding Shop — New!
• Update: You can now view our editorial look books
• Shopping Update - New and improved refine feature, subcategory navigation, faster app + more!
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

We've made quite a few updates! Download the latest version of our app to browse our new features.

Thanks,
FWRD

FWRD iPhone App V3.2.0
• Shopping Bag Sync — New! You can now sync your bag across all properties
• Update: Improvements with login, wish list, and shopping bag pages
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

We've made even more app updates! Download the latest version to browse through our new features.
Thanks,
FWRD

FWRD iPhone App V3.3.0
• Update: A new "My Account" section featuring store credit, items on hold, special orders, and email preferences
• A new easy-to-use menu for better navigation
• Zoom improvement

We've made quite a few updates! Download the latest version of our app for our new easy-to-use checkout!

Thanks,
FWRD

FWRD iPad App V3.4.0
New features include:
• Redesigned checkout — Now faster and easier to use
• Option to check out as guest
• Optimized forms for international customers
• Option to select from saved shipping and payment options
• New! You can now scan your credit card

We've made quite a few updates! Download the latest version of our app to browse our new features.

Thanks,
FWRD

FWRD iPhone App V3.4.1
New features include:
• Paypal
• Update: Security enhancements at checkout
• New! Easy-to-use gift options at checkout
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

New features include:
• New! E-gift certificates, international currencies
• Update: My Account enhancements
• iOS 11 Updates
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

Please update your app for these important fixes!
• Resetting filters no longer crashes the app
• Navigation does not disappear when moving from product list to product detail pages
• Saving a billing option at checkout no longer crashes the app

Please update your app for the following fixes!
• Next page takes you to the top, instead of the middle of the page
• Men's category menu no longer crashes the app

Fixes include:
• Returning customers can now change their shipping addresses at checkout
• Other bug fixes and improvements

FWRD iPhone App V3.5.0
• New + improved features include:
• Hearting your favorite products to add to your wish list got so much easier
• New! Share your wish list
• Redesigned product detail pages — take a look!
• Redesigned customer care section
• General bug fixes & performance improvements

Download the latest version of our app to browse our new and updated features.

Thanks,
FWRD
Fixed crash bug related to animating and hiding the tab bar on product list pages for V3.5.0.

Updates include:
• For most of Europe, orders are now charged in your local billing currency
• New and improved shipping forms at checkout
• Address verification at checkout
• Security code requirement at checkout to reduce order declines for certain countries
• Final sale messaging
• Add to bag confirmation
• Other bug fixes and improvements
Whoops! A crash bug slipped by us. It's all fixed, so please update and enjoy shopping!

• Discover new recommendations on the homepage
• Faster checkout for US customers with a zip code mapping feature
• Updates to data and privacy
• Fixed those pesky bugs

• Review our app after your purchase
• Added Touch ID and Face ID
• Bug fixes
We fixed some deep linking issues. Please update!

• New: iCloud Password Support
• Restarting the app will remember where you left off
• App speed performance improvements for a faster experience
• Improvements to China's shipping address form
• Bug fixes and improvements!

• New! Shops section with the latest trends and curated shops.
• Improvement: VoiceOver accessibility support
• Bug fixes

• Improved! Next Date pagination for New Arrivals section
• Added Terms of Service and Privacy Policy links
• Display Duty Free messaging for South Korea
• Fixed unisex images and sizes
• Bug fixes
Fixed a bug — please update!
Bug fixes!

• Checkout improvements for China customers
• Fixes and improvements to hamburger menu
• Other bug fixes and improvements

• New: Country Preferences
• CCPA Do Not Sell My Info
• Bug Fixes

• Cordial SDK
• Bug fixes
Bug fixes and improvements — please update!
Fixed: Search, Wish List, and Shopping Bag buttons now work after visiting the Designer index page. Please update!
Fixed gift option issue at checkout. Please update!
